divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work one night, I am in restaurant management, and while on I-49, I saw a light appear from the sky. At first I thought it was a helicopter, but the light shined on my car and then it was just gone. It didnt 'fly away', just disappeared. Whatever it was, hovered over my car from about 40 - 50 feet above me and it lasted just for a few seconds.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Shreveport
There were no other sightings in Shreveport on or around August 29th 2009
